    actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.gui.AddCustomerWindow
    Responds to button clicks: Add: Reads field inputs, executes AddCustomer to create the customer, attempts to auto-save, and closes the window if successful. Cancel: Simply closes this window.
